roleset.name: apply pressure, possibly to do something

role.descr: goal, pressed-for, arg1 is pressed to do what?

example.name: press-v: all args present
example.text: For more than a decade, banks have been pressing Congress and banking regulators for expanded powers to act like securities firms in playing Wall Street's lucrative takeover game, from giving mergers advice all the way to selling and trading high-yield junk bonds.
example.arg: for expanded powers to act like securities firms in playing Wall Street's lucrative takeover game, from giving mergers advice all the way to selling and trading high-yield junk bonds.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Otherwise , they say , it may be impossible to press reparation claims against shipping companies that accurately reflect the extent of damages .
example.arg: that accurately reflect the extent of damages

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: Hence in our future approach to the UN , besides continuing to press for admission by mobilizing our diplomatic partners to speak on our behalf , we should also actively seek to make the most of the power of our people .
example.arg: by mobilizing our diplomatic partners to speak on our behalf

example.name: idiomatic: hard pressed
example.text: The House has already voted for a deep cut in funding, and in the end the program's backers will be hard pressed [*] to head off some reduction in spending next year.
example.arg: to head off some reduction in spending next year.

example.name: pressing-j
example.text: This shows two points : first , the situation is pressing and complicated .

roleset.note: PRESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'press' based on sentences in financial subcorpus; adjectival 'pressing' based on BOLT-6. This class corresponds to both push-12-1-1 and force-59. (from press.01-v)
PRESSING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to press.01. Press.01 is a member of VN classes push-12-1-1 and force-59. Framedby Katie. (from pressing.01-n)
PRESSED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from pressed.01-j)
PRESSING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from pressing.01-j)

roleset.name: move

example.name: press-v: all args present
example.text: But [the pilots union, which has been pushing for a takeover since 1987,]-1 appears *trace*-1 to be pressing ahead with the revised bid to avoid further loss of momentum even though it hasn't found a partner to replace British Air.
example.arg: to avoid further loss of momentum
even though it hasn't found a partner to replace British Air.

roleset.note: PRESS-V NOTES: Verbnet class push-12-1-1. (from press.02-v)

roleset.name: make and produce

example.name: press-v: records
example.text: This young woman carefully pressing black phonograph records was none other than boss Yeh's wife.

roleset.note: PRESS-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena. (from press.03-v)
